ygData.subject: RE: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Would that really be a problem though?  Except for monks, your fists seem to be a 2 damage 30 delay weapon.  The maximum I ever hit for before level 20 is
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 7 Oct 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> True, but at the level you are fighting wisps for example a cap of 100 on a
> level based skill is moot; you can't get there anyway. They just didnt want
> any melee type running around killing wisps with something they got off a
> level 7 froglock, like woven gloves.

Would that really be a problem though? Except for monks, your
fists seem to be a 2 damage 30 delay weapon. The maximum I
ever hit for before level 20 is 5 points. The maximum I've
ever hit for so far at level 35 is 8.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
